strings.GADGET_DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to use the Event API
strings.GADGET_COPYRIGHT: Copyright (c) 2007 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved
strings.GADGET_ABOUT: Event API Sample Gadget Copyright (c) 2007 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved This gadget shows how to use the Event API to show the URL of the latest website you've visited.
strings.FAILED_EVENT_API: Failed to subscribe to the Event API!
strings.BROWSE: Open your web browser and go to any website.
